title: Invoke a Step functions workflow from Appsync
description: Invoke a step functions workflow through a lambda resolver from Appsync

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to Invoke a Step functions workflow, using Appsync and a Lambda resolver.
This pattern deploys an Appsync Api, a lambda resolver, a DynamoDB and a Step Function workflow using CDK.

bullets.text: AWS CDK- Define cloud infrastructure using familiar programming languages
AWS Appsync - Accelerate application development with serverless GraphQL and Pub/Sub APIs
AWS Step functions- Visual workflows for modern applications
Amazon DynamoDB - Fast, flexible NoSQL database service for single-digit millisecond performance at any scale
